sqlMap.select:
SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_NAME, e.EMPLOYEE_GRADE, e.IMAGE_ID, f.project_name, sum( CASE WHEN (d.STATUS = '2' or d.status='3') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS A, sum( CASE WHEN d.STATUS = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS B
FROM tbl_task_target d, tbl_employee_info e, tbl_project_info f WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_ID = d.VERIFY_ID AND d.CONTRACT_NO=f.contract_no AND ( d.STATUS = '3' OR d.STATUS = '2' )
date_format(d.BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
date_format(d.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
-- AND -- date_format(d.BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= '2017-10-10' AND date_format(d.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= -- '2017-10-10' GROUP by d.VERIFY_ID order by B DESC

SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_NAME, e.EMPLOYEE_GRADE, e.IMAGE_ID, f.project_name, sum( CASE WHEN (d.STATUS = '2' or d.status='3') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS A, sum( CASE WHEN d.STATUS = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS B, cast( sum( CASE WHEN ( d. STATUS = '3') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )*100./sum( CASE WHEN d. STATUS = '3' OR d. STATUS = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as decimal(18,0)) as C FROM tbl_task_target d, tbl_employee_info e, tbl_project_info f WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_ID = d.VERIFY_ID AND d.CONTRACT_NO=f.contract_no AND ( d.STATUS = '3' OR d.STATUS = '2' )
date_format(d.BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
date_format(d.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
-- AND -- date_format(d.BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= '2017-10-10' AND date_format(d.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')= -- '2017-10-10' GROUP by d.VERIFY_ID order by C DESC

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
emp.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #employeeGrade:CHAR#
emp.GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT tc.employee_id from tbl_project_etc tc where tc.contract_no = #properties.projectId:VARCHAR# )
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info where 1=1 and IS_ON_DUTY ='01'
#properties.departmentIdList[]#

select * from tbl_employee_info where 1=1 and IS_ON_DUTY ='01'
#properties.employeeIdList[]#

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and not EXISTS( SELECT distinct task.employee_id FROM tbl_task_target task WHERE emp.employee_id = task.employee_id and date_format( task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR# and task.TASK_TYPE='2')

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.*, dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and not EXISTS( SELECT distinct task.employee_id FROM tbl_task_target task WHERE emp.employee_id = task.employee_id and date_format( task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR# and task.TASK_TYPE='2')

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
and not EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR# and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR#)
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
date_format( sig.sign_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and sig.sign_out_time is not null
)
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #properties.signTime:VARCHAR#

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
date_format( sig.sign_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and sig.sign_out_time is not null
)
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #properties.signTime:VARCHAR#

select * from tbl_employee_info where
CONVERT(EMPLOYEE_GRADE,SIGNED) <= CONVERT(#employeeGrade:CHAR#,SIGNED)
and BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR# and IS_ON_DUTY ='01'

select * from tbl_employee_info where DEPARTMENT_ID =#departmentId:VARCHAR#
and CONVERT(EMPLOYEE_GRADE,SIGNED) <= CONVERT(#employeeGrade:CHAR#,SIGNED)
and IS_ON_DUTY ='01'

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
and not EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR# and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR#)
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro ,tbl_department_info dept where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%') and emp.DEPARTMENT_ID = dept.DEPARTMENT_ID
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #properties.planEndDate:VARCHAR#
dept.AREA = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.companyid:VARCHAR#

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and etc.is_leave='00' and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #properties.planEndDate:VARCHAR#
dep.AREA = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.companyid:VARCHAR#

select * from tbl_employee_info
order by $orderByClause$
select * from tbl_employee_info where EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tbl_employee_info (EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE_GRADE, EMAIL, MOBILE, CARDID, EMPLOYEE_DUTY, DEPARTMENT_ID, IS_ON_DUTY, INTEGRATION, STOCK, LEVEL, IMAGE_ID, BOARDING_TIME, EMPLOYEE_ADRESS, SEX, EMPLOYEE_NATION, BIRTH_TIME, WORK_LIFE, DEGREE, LEAVE_TIME, HUKOU, HUKOU_TYPE, MARRIED_STATUS, POLITICS_STATUS, EDUCATION_BACKGROUND, GRADUTED_SCHOOL, MAJOR, GRADUTED_TIME, BEGIN_WORK_TIME, LABOR_CONTRACT_BEGIN_TIME, LABOR_CONTRACT_END_TIME, Expected_positive_time, actual_positive_time, household_address, Employment_way, LEAVE_REASON,BEYOND_COMPANY,GRASS_LEVEL_ID,IS_FIXED_PLACE_WORKING,actual_employee_id,is_check_imsi,entry_times) values (#employeeId:VARCHAR#, #employeeName:VARCHAR#, #employeeGrade:CHAR#, #email:VARCHAR#, #mobile:CHAR#, #cardid:VARCHAR#, #employeeDuty:VARCHAR#, #departmentId:CHAR#, #isOnDuty:CHAR#, #integration:INTEGER#, #stock:INTEGER#, #level:INTEGER#, #imageId:VARCHAR#, #boardingTime:DATE#, #employeeAdress:VARCHAR#, #sex:CHAR#, #employeeNation:VARCHAR#, #birthTime:DATE#, #workLife:DECIMAL#, #degree:VARCHAR#, #leaveTime:DATE#, #hukou:VARCHAR#, #hukouType:CHAR#, #marriedStatus:CHAR#, #politicsStatus:CHAR#, #educationBackground:CHAR#, #gradutedSchool:VARCHAR#, #major:VARCHAR#, #gradutedTime:DATE#, #beginWorkTime:DATE#, #laborContractBeginTime:DATE#, #laborContractEndTime:DATE#, #expectedPositiveTime:DATE#, #actualPositiveTime:DATE#, #householdAddress:VARCHAR#, #employmentWay:VARCHAR#, #leaveReason:VARCHAR#,#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#, #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#,#isFixedPlaceWorking:CHAR#,#actualEmployeeId:VARCHAR#,#isCheckImsi:CHAR#,#entryTimes:varchar #)

update tbl_employee_info

actual_positive_time = #record.actualPositiveTime:DATE#
household_address = #record.householdAddress:VARCHAR#
Employment_way = #record.employmentWay:VARCHAR#

actual_employee_id = #record.actualEmployeeId:CHAR#
actual_employee_id = #record.isCheckImsi:CHAR#
entry_times = #record.entryTimes:VARCHAR#

update tbl_employee_info set EMPLOYEE_NAME = #employeeName:VARCHAR#, EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #employeeGrade:CHAR#, EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #mobile:CHAR#, CARDID = #cardid:VARCHAR#, EMPLOYEE_DUTY = #employeeDuty:VARCHAR#, DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:CHAR#, IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:CHAR#, INTEGRATION = #integration:INTEGER#, STOCK = #stock:INTEGER#, LEVEL = #level:INTEGER#, IMAGE_ID = #imageId:VARCHAR#, BOARDING_TIME = #boardingTime:DATE#, EMPLOYEE_ADRESS = #employeeAdress:VARCHAR#, SEX = #sex:CHAR#, EMPLOYEE_NATION = #employeeNation:VARCHAR#, BIRTH_TIME = #birthTime:DATE#, WORK_LIFE = #workLife:DECIMAL#, DEGREE = #degree:VARCHAR#, LEAVE_TIME = #leaveTime:DATE#, HUKOU = #hukou:VARCHAR#, HUKOU_TYPE = #hukouType:CHAR#, MARRIED_STATUS = #marriedStatus:CHAR#, POLITICS_STATUS = #politicsStatus:CHAR#, EDUCATION_BACKGROUND = #educationBackground:CHAR#, GRADUTED_SCHOOL = #gradutedSchool:VARCHAR#, MAJOR = #major:VARCHAR#, GRADUTED_TIME = #gradutedTime:DATE#, BEGIN_WORK_TIME = #beginWorkTime:DATE#, LABOR_CONTRACT_BEGIN_TIME = #laborContractBeginTime:DATE#, Expected_positive_time = #expectedPositiveTime:DATE#, actual_positive_time = #actualPositiveTime:DATE#, household_address = #householdAddress:VARCHAR#, Employment_way = #employmentWay:VARCHAR#, LEAVE_REASON = #leaveReason:VARCHAR#, BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#, GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#, IS_FIXED_PLACE_WORKING = #isFixedPlaceWorking:VARCHAR#, actual_Employee_Id = #actualEmployeeId:VARCHAR#, is_check_imsi = #isCheckImsi:CHAR# entry_times = #entryTimes:VARCHAR# where EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT fo.* FROM tbl_employee_info fo,tbl_project_team_emp_rel rel WHERE fo.EMPLOYEE_ID = rel.EMPLOYEE_ID AND rel.CONTRACT_TEAM_NO=#value:VARCHAR#

SELECT fo.* FROM tbl_employee_info fo, (SELECT * FROM tbl_project_etc etc WHERE etc.employee_id NOT IN ( SELECT rel.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM tbl_project_team_info tinfo,tbl_project_team_emp_rel rel where tinfo.CONTRACT_TEAM_NO=rel.CONTRACT_TEAM_NO and tinfo.CONTRACT_NO=#properties.contract_no:VARCHAR# )) exp WHERE fo.EMPLOYEE_ID = exp.EMPLOYEE_ID AND exp.contract_no=#properties.contract_no:VARCHAR# AND exp.is_leave='00'
SELECT fo.* FROM tbl_employee_info fo,tbl_project_etc etc WHERE fo.EMPLOYEE_ID = etc.EMPLOYEE_ID AND etc.contract_no=#value:VARCHAR# AND etc.is_leave='00'
SELECT fo.* FROM tbl_employee_info fo,tbl_project_etc etc WHERE fo.EMPLOYEE_ID = etc.employee_id AND fo.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR# AND etc.contract_no=#properties.contractNo:VARCHAR #
SELECT o.* FROM tbl_employee_info o , tbl_emp_organ_struct t WHERE o.EMPLOYEE_ID = t.EMPLOYEE_ID AND o.IS_ON_DUTY='01' AND t.PARENT_EMPLOYEE_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
SELECT o.employee_id, o.employee_name FROM tbl_employee_info o , tbl_emp_organ_struct t WHERE o.EMPLOYEE_ID = t.EMPLOYEE_ID AND o.IS_ON_DUTY='01' AND t.PARENT_EMPLOYEE_ID=#value:VARCHAR#
SELECT IMAGE_ID FROM tbl_employee_info WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #value:VARCHAR#
SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_employee_info

SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_equipment_record a, tbl_equipment_info b WHERE a.EQUIPMENT_ID = b.EQUIPMENT_ID AND a.EMPLOYEE_ID = ANY ( SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID FROM tbl_employee_info WHERE IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:VARCHAR#
EMPLOYEE_NAME = #employeeName:VARCHAR#
)
a.IS_RETURN = #isReturn:VARCHAR#
b.EQUIPMENT_SERIAL = #equipmentSerial:VARCHAR#
a.IS_RETURN = '0'
a.IS_CHANGE = #isChange:VARCHAR#
a.IS_ACEPT = #isAcept:VARCHAR#
a.IS_ACEPT = '1'

SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_employee_info emp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_etc etc on etc.employee_id = emp.employee_id AND etc.is_Leave = '00' AND emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01'
emp.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
emp.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
emp.EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #employeeGrade:CHAR#
emp.IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:CHAR#
emp.GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT tc.employee_id from tbl_project_etc tc where tc.contract_no = #properties.projectId:VARCHAR# )
LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro on etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no order by emp.employee_id DESC

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee_info
order BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC

SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID,EMPLOYEE_NAME,LABOR_CONTRACT_BEGIN_TIME,LABOR_CONTRACT_END_TIME FROM tbl_employee_info WHERE (SELECT DATEDIFF(LABOR_CONTRACT_END_TIME,NOW())) < 7 AND (SELECT DATEDIFF(LABOR_CONTRACT_END_TIME,NOW())) > 0
DEPARTMENT_ID in(select department_id from tbl_project_info WHERE contract_no in(select ROLE_ENTILENMENT from tbl_project_menu WHERE ROLE_ID =#roleId:VARCHAR# AND ROLE_CHECKED=1 AND LENGTH(ROLE_ENTILENMENT)=11 ))

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee_info
order BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_employee_info,tbl_department_info dep where dep.DEPARTMENT_ID = tbl_employee_info.DEPARTMENT_ID
dep.area=#properties.employeeinfoArea:VARCHAR#
order BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC

SELECT emp.*,pro.short_project_name FROM tbl_employee_info emp LEFT JOIN tbl_project_etc etc on etc.employee_id = emp.employee_id AND etc.is_Leave = '00' AND emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01'
emp.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
emp.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
emp.EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #employeeGrade:CHAR#
emp.IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:CHAR#
emp.GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT tc.employee_id from tbl_project_etc tc where tc.contract_no = #properties.projectId:VARCHAR# )
LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro on etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no order by emp.employee_id DESC

info.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee_info WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=#value:VARCHAR#

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee_info WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID NOT IN (SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID FROM tbl_emp_organ_struct)

SELECT info.actual_employee_id,k.project_name,k.project_actual_no,dep.AREA as area,dep.DEPARTMENT_NAME,info.EMPLOYEE_GRADE,gd.GRADE_NAME,info.EMPLOYEE_NAME, info.BOARDING_TIME,info.CARDID,info.SEX,info.BIRTH_TIME,DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS( NOW( ) )-TO_DAYS( info.BIRTH_TIME ) ),'%Y' ) +0 AS age, info.HUKOU,info.HUKOU_TYPE,info.MARRIED_STATUS,info.POLITICS_STATUS,info.EDUCATION_BACKGROUND,info.GRADUTED_SCHOOL, info.MAJOR,info.GRADUTED_TIME,round(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY , info.BOARDING_TIME, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())/365,2) as borderPeroid, info.BEGIN_WORK_TIME,info.MOBILE,info.LABOR_CONTRACT_BEGIN_TIME,info.Expected_positive_time,info.actual_positive_time, DATE_ADD(info.LABOR_CONTRACT_BEGIN_TIME,INTERVAL 3 YEAR ) AS deadlineTime, (3*12*30-DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(),BOARDING_TIME))/30 as remainTime,info.household_address,info.EMPLOYEE_ADRESS,info.Employment_way, info.LEAVE_POST_TIME,null as month_leave_rate,null as year_leave_rate,info.LEAVE_REASON,null as is_quit FROM tbl_employee_info info LEFT JOIN tbl_department_info dep ON info.DEPARTMENT_ID=dep.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_employee_grade gd ON info.EMPLOYEE_DUTY=gd.GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN (select etc.*,pf.project_name,pf.project_actual_no from tbl_project_etc etc LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pf on etc.contract_no=pf.contract_no where etc.is_Leave='00' or etc.is_Leave is null) as k ON info.EMPLOYEE_ID=k.employee_id
info.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
info.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
info.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
info.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
info.GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#
info.IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:VARCHAR#

SELECT * FROM tbl_employee_info tei ,tbl_department_info dept WHERE tei.DEPARTMENT_ID = dept.DEPARTMENT_ID
dept.AREA = #properties.projectManageArea:VARCHAR#
tei.EMPLOYEE_NAME like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
tei.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
tei.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
tei.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
tei.EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#
tei.EMPLOYEE_GRADE = #employeeGrade:CHAR#
tei.IS_ON_DUTY = #isOnDuty:CHAR#
tei.GRASS_LEVEL_ID = #grassLevelId:VARCHAR#
tei.EMPLOYEE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT tc.employee_id from tbl_project_etc tc where tc.contract_no = #properties.projectId:VARCHAR# )
order BY tei.EMPLOYEE_ID DESC

SELECT k.EMPLOYEE_ID,k.num as taskCount from( select ifnull(a.countNum,0) as num,cc.employee_id FROM tbl_project_etc cc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(1) as countNum,tt.EMPLOYEE_ID from tbl_task_target tt where date_format(tt.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY tt.EMPLOYEE_ID)a ON cc.employee_id=a.EMPLOYEE_ID where cc.contract_no=#contractNo# )k where k.num<#needCount#
sqlMap.update: update tbl_employee_info set INTEGRATION = 0 where EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
update tbl_equipment_record set IS_RETURN = '1',RETURN_TIME = #returnTime:VARCHAR#,ACCEPT_USER = #acceptUser:VARCHAR# where EQUIPMENT_ID = #equipmentId:VARCHAR#
update tbl_equipment_info set EQUIPMENT_COL = #equipmentCol:VARCHAR# where EQUIPMENT_ID = #equipmentId:VARCHAR#
update tbl_equipment_record set IS_CHANGE = '1',CHANGE_TIME = #changeTime:VARCHAR#,CHANGE_SERIAL = #changeSerial:VARCHAR# where EQUIPMENT_ID = #equipmentId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select * from tbl_employee_info where EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update tbl_employee_info set INTEGRATION = #integration:INTEGER# where EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select CAT_ID from tbl_emp_organ_struct eos where eos.PARENT_EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#

select emp.* from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01'

select emp.* from tbl_employee_info emp,tbl_project_etc etc,tbl_project_info pro,tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractNo:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id= #properties.departmentId:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.companyId:VARCHAR#
emp.EMPLOYEE_ID = #properties.queryEmployeeId:VARCHAR#

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_leave as lv , tbl_employee_info as emp , tbl_project_etc as etc , tbl_project_info as pro , tbl_department_info as dep where lv.employee_id = emp.employee_id and emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id
lv.check_type = #properties.checktype:VARCHAR#
(lv.check_type = '1' or lv.check_type = '2')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractnos:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
date_format(lv.leave_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR# and date_format(lv.leave_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY emp.employee_id HAVING count(emp.employee_id)>0 ORDER BY lv.leave_end_date desc

select count(*) from tbl_employee_leave as lv , tbl_employee_info as emp , tbl_project_etc as etc , tbl_project_info as pro , tbl_department_info as dep where lv.employee_id = emp.employee_id and emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id
lv.check_type = #properties.checktype:VARCHAR#
date_format(lv.leave_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR# and date_format(lv.leave_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY emp.employee_id HAVING count(emp.employee_id)>0 ORDER BY lv.leave_end_date desc

select ifnull(f.fnum,0) + ifnull(k.dupnum,0) as num from (select count(*) as fnum from (select emp.employee_id from tbl_employee_leave as lv , tbl_employee_info as emp , tbl_project_etc as etc , tbl_project_info as pro , tbl_department_info as dep where lv.employee_id = emp.employee_id and emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id
lv.check_type = #properties.checktype:VARCHAR#
(lv.check_type = '1' or lv.check_type = '2')
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractnos:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
dep.AREA = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
date_format(lv.leave_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR# and date_format(lv.leave_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY emp.employee_id HAVING count(emp.employee_id) =1)B)f ,(select count(1) as dupnum from (select emp.employee_id from tbl_employee_leave as lv , tbl_employee_info as emp , tbl_project_etc as etc , tbl_project_info as pro , tbl_department_info as dep where lv.employee_id = emp.employee_id and emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id
lv.check_type = #properties.checktype:VARCHAR#
(lv.check_type = '1' or lv.check_type = '2')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractnos:VARCHAR#
dep.AREA = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
date_format(lv.leave_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR# and date_format(lv.leave_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY emp.employee_id HAVING count(emp.employee_id) >1) A)k

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_employee_info emps ,tbl_task_target task WHERE emps.employee_id = task.employee_id
date_format(task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
emps.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
emps.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and task.STATUS in ('3','2') GROUP BY task.employee_id

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_employee_info emps ,tbl_task_target task WHERE emps.employee_id = task.employee_id
date_format(task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
emps.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
emps.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and task.STATUS in ('3','2','1','0') GROUP BY task.employee_id

SELECT count( * ) AS taskCounts,emps.IMAGE_ID,emps.EMPLOYEE_NAME,emps.EMPLOYEE_GRADE,emps.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM tbl_employee_info emps, tbl_task_target task WHERE emps.employee_id = task.employee_id AND date_format( task.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = '2015-10-12' AND task.STATUS IN ( '3', '2', '1', '0' )
emps.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY task.employee_id ORDER BY count( * ) desc LIMIT 20

select pro.project_name , pro.contract_no, emp.*, dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep ,tbl_task_target task where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and emp.employee_id = task.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and task.TASK_TYPE='2'
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractno:VARCHAR#
date_format(task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.createtime:VARCHAR#
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.planenddate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY task.employee_id
HAVING count(task.employee_id) < #properties.xiaoyusignTime:VARCHAR#
HAVING count(task.employee_id) >= #properties.dayusignTime:VARCHAR#

select pro.project_name , pro.contract_no, emp.*, dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep ,tbl_task_target task where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and emp.employee_id = task.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and task.TASK_TYPE='2'
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #properties.contractno:VARCHAR#
date_format(task.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.createtime:VARCHAR#
date_format(pro.plan_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #properties.planenddate:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY task.employee_id
HAVING count(task.employee_id) < #properties.xiaoyusignTime:VARCHAR#
HAVING count(task.employee_id) >= #properties.dayusignTime:VARCHAR#

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR#
)

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR#
)

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00'
etc.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#

select dep_.department_name, teg_.grade_name, emp_.* from tbl_employee_info emp_ ,tbl_department_info dep_,tbl_employee_grade teg_ where emp_.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and teg_.GRADE_ID = emp_.EMPLOYEE_DUTY and dep_.department_id = emp_.department_id
emp_.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
dep_.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and emp_.employee_id not in(
select emp.employee_id from tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro, tbl_employee_info emp where etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and etc.employee_id = emp.EMPLOYEE_ID and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_Leave = '00'
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
order by etc.employee_id )

select count(*) from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_department_info dep, tbl_employee_grade teg where emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and teg.GRADE_ID = emp.EMPLOYEE_DUTY and dep.department_id = emp.department_id
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and emp.employee_id not in(
select emp.employee_id from tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro, tbl_employee_info emp where etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and etc.employee_id = emp.employee_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_Leave = '00'
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
order by etc.employee_id )

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.employee_id not in ('00000275','00000100')
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and str_to_date(substring(sig.sign_in_time, 12,5),"%H:%i") >= str_to_date(pro.standwork_starttime,'%H:%i')
)

select pro.project_name ,pro.contract_no, emp.* , dep.department_name from tbl_employee_info emp, tbl_project_etc etc , tbl_project_info pro , tbl_department_info dep where emp.employee_id = etc.employee_id and etc.contract_no = pro.contract_no and dep.department_id = emp.department_id and emp.IS_ON_DUTY ='01' and etc.is_leave='00' and emp.employee_id not in ('00000275','00000100')
emp.employee_name like concat('%', #employeeName:VARCHAR#, '%')
emp.BEYOND_COMPANY = #beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
pro.contract_no = #contractno:VARCHAR#
emp.department_id = #departmentId:VARCHAR#
dep.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#
and EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM tbl_sign_in_out_record sig WHERE emp.employee_id = sig.employee_id and emp.beyond_company =#beyondCompany:VARCHAR#
and sig.sign_time=#properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and date_format(sig.sign_in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #properties.signTime:VARCHAR# and str_to_date(substring(sig.sign_in_time, 12,5),"%H:%i") >= str_to_date(pro.standwork_starttime,'%H:%i')
)

dep.area=#properties.employeeinfoArea:VARCHAR#

LEAVE_POST_TIME DESC,
EMPLOYEE_ID DESC

dep.area=#properties.employeeinfoArea:VARCHAR#

dep.area=#properties.employeeinfoArea:VARCHAR#
